gstore.lucene

Class IndexSearcher2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher
      • gstore.lucene.IndexSearcher2

  • public class IndexSearcher2
extends org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher
    IndexSearcher2 is an IndexSearcher with some added fields and a close() function. The timestamp is useful for recycling and pooling. The ID allows retrieving the same IndexSearcher for consistent paging (next, previous queries). This object holds also a reference to the last document after each query, to be used by searchAfter() later. This IndexSearcher version is to be used by a single thread, if 'after' is to be of any use.
